['DescriptionA meticulously upgraded villa located on Palm Jumeirah. Situated high on the frond B, it is located on a south facing plot, ideally positioned to enjoy the winter sun, and boasts modern landscaping and a brand new extra large heated and chilled L shaped dark blue swimming pool. 
Property highlights:
• Upgraded and Remodeled 4 Bed Villa
• Central Rotunda
• Upgraded Kitchen & Bathrooms
• New Floors and Ceilings 
• BUA: 5,000 sq.ft
• Plot: 6,695 Sq.ft
• L-Shaped Swimming Pool
• Sunken Seated Area
• Private Beach
This ultra modern 4 bedroom villa consists of a large  family room on the ground floor with very high ceilings  opening up to a second family room, large closed kitchen/breakfast area, guest bedroom, maids room and cloakroom. The villa has been completely designed and remodelled with substantially enlarged bedrooms and boasts a  brand new  kitchen and bathrooms, new floors and ceilings. 
Rising to the first floor via a grand open staircase you are greeted by a open  vaulted landing area with entrance to three large double en suite bedrooms, affording some of the  best views in Dubai. 
The property is completed by a large integrated double garage, with additional parking for 2 further vehicles on the driveway.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionFAM Real Estate Brokers the specialists of Dubai hills Estate proudly present you this type E1 3 Bedroom Villa in a single row the most sought out location in Sidra Phase 1. Some of the details of the property are as below :
Villa Description:
In the light of the above I present to you this 3 bedroom type 1 villa in Sidra phase 1. Comprising of 3 phases, this villa is located in Phase 1 which is being handed over currently. This particular villa has just been handed over and placed in a single row location making it an ideal option for a privatized backyard location. Spreading on a built up area of 3102 sqft it also covers a very good land size of 4359 sqft .
